name: Lost in the Dungeon - Roguelite Mode
name_original: Lost in the Dungeon - Roguelite Mode
description:
Hi, this is Kaku! 

This proyect is a diferent  version of the "Mission Mode" of Lost in the Dungeon, as it has been remade into a roguelite, including a lot of new features.
The visuals have remained the same, but the  playability is completely different now: a economy system based in gold has been implemented, so now weapons and spells can be bought (enabling builds). The map is now generated procedurally, so each run will be unique, I hope you like this new version! ^^
